page.title: 10Sports
page.content: About 1/3 of people interviewed use the Crook Log Sports Centre which was opened in 1982. Swimming and badminton are the most popular sports,then come squash,keep fit,weight training,judo and karate Crook Log Swimming Baths has been re-named SPLASHWORLD because it has recently opened the Aquazoom Tubes_ named Sidewinder and Vortex.There is only one other like it in the rest of London.You descend about 150 feet through a tube and land in a pool at the bottom.It costs one pound fifty pence for ten rides. Football is the most popular team game for boys and there are many local amateur clubs for all ages.The best club here is Welling United who play in the Southern Premier League. Girls play mostly netball and hockey for their team games.
